topic_reasoning_zh: 四张图片展现四季场景（夏滩、秋叶、冬雪等），主题为四季的自然美景。
topic_reasoning_en: Each image shows a season's scene (beach, leaves, snow), theme is four seasons' beauty.

images.reasoning_zh: 图片未体现四季特征，仅展示普通自然光影
images.reasoning_en: The picture lacks seasonal features, only showing ordinary natural light and shadow

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示海滩风光，无明确四季自然特征
images.reasoning_en: The picture shows beach scenery without clear seasonal natural features

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示秋日枫叶，属四季自然美景的一部分
images.reasoning_en: Image shows autumn maple leaves, part of four seasons' natural beauty

images.reasoning_zh: 图片展示冬季雪景，是四季自然美景的一部分
images.reasoning_en: Picture shows winter snow scenery, part of four seasons' natural beauty
